message: Let's start fair.  I propose an even split.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation
I'm willing to compromise, but I still believe an even split is fair, considering the inflation affects us both.  Let's meet in the middle.
Inflation is hitting me harder, I need a bigger share to make up for it
I'm willing to give you a larger share, but I need at least 60 to make this worthwhile for me.  Let's end this game before inflation eats away at our earnings any further.
